welcome: Hello! I am Pravus, your electronic manuals assistant. Please upload a manual using the "Upload Manual" button to get started. I can answer questions about your electronic devices based on the manuals you provide.
askQuestion: Ask a question about electronic manuals...
disclaimer: Pravus AI may produce inaccurate information about electronic manuals.

chat.pdfPlaceholder: PDF viewer will be displayed here
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question about the manual...

createTicket.title: Create Support Ticket
createTicket.description: Please describe what you were looking for and why the response wasn't helpful.

notifications.ticketSuccess: Ticket created successfully. Our team will look into it.
notifications.chatError: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting to the server. Please try again later.
notifications.languageError: Failed to change language. Please try again.
notifications.syncError: Failed to sync files with server
